data.chText: 议论；评论；解释
data.enText: something that you say or write which gives an opinion on or explains sb/sth

data.chText: 你对发生灾难的原因有何评论？
data.enText: Have you any comment to make about the cause of the disaster?

data.chText: 她对我的工作提出了有益的意见。
data.enText: She made helpful comments on my work.

data.chText: 经理抽不出时间来作出评论。
data.enText: The director was not available for comment.

data.chText: 他未作任何解释就把文件交给了我。
data.enText: He handed me the document without comment.

data.chText: 她所讲的是合乎情理的批评。
data.enText: What she said was fair comment (= a reasonable criticism) .

data.chText: 批评；指责
data.enText: criticism that shows the faults of sth

data.chText: 这些结果是对政府教育政策明显的批评。
data.enText: The results are a clear comment on government education policy.

data.chText: 对他的行为举止有很多的议论。
data.enText: There was a lot of comment about his behaviour.
no comment

data.chText: 无可奉告

before.chText: 通常用于回答记者的问题
before.enText: said in reply to a question, usually from a journalist

data.enText: I have nothing to say about that

data.chText: “先生，你会辞职吗？”“无可奉告！”
data.enText: ‘Will you resign, sir?’ ‘No comment!’

data.chText: 表达意见
data.enText: to express an opinion about sth

data.chText: 我觉得我无法对他们的决定作出评论。
data.enText: I don't feel I can comment on their decision.

data.chText: 他拒绝在审判前作任何评论。
data.enText: He refused to comment until after the trial.

data.chText: 发言人称二氧化碳的含量很高。
data.enText: A spokesperson commented that levels of carbon dioxide were very high.

data.chText: “这不是他的最佳表现。”她对坐在她旁边的女士议论道。
data.enText: ‘Not his best performance,’ she commented to the woman sitting next to her.

data.chText: 以上各词均指口头或书面说明事实或发表意见。
data.enText: These words all mean to say or write a fact or opinion.
comment

data.chText: 指发表意见或说明事实：
data.enText: to express an opinion or give facts about sth

data.chText: 在审判结果出来之前他拒绝给予任何评论。
data.enText: He refused to comment until after the trial.
note

data.chText: 指特别提到或指出：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to mention sth because it is important or interesting

data.chText: 他顺便提到该公司在安全方面的记录不好。
data.enText: He noted in passing that the company's record on safety issues was not good.
remark

data.chText: 指说起、谈论、评论：
data.enText: to say or write what you have noticed about a situation

data.chText: 评论家指出这部戏剧缺乏创意。
data.enText: Critics remarked that the play was not original.
observe

data.chText: 指说起、谈论、评论：
data.enText: ( formal ) to say or write what you have noticed about a situation

data.chText: 她说天色晚了。
data.enText: She observed that it was getting late.

data.chText: 用comment、remark还是observe？
comment on表示谈论某事，remark on或observe表示谈论或评论注意到的事物。以上三词通常无大的区别，但拒绝评论可用refuse to comment（不带on），不能说refuse to remark或refuse to observe（不带on）：
data.enText: If you comment on sth you say sth about it; if you remark on sth or observe sth, you say sth about it that you have noticed: there is often not much difference between the three. However, while you can refuse to comment (without on ), you cannot ‘refuse to remark’ or ‘refuse to observe’ (without on ).
He refused to remark/observe until after the trial.
comment, remark or observe?
to comment/note/remark/observe that…
to comment on/note/remark/observe how…
‘It's long,’ he commented/noted/remarked/observed.
to comment/remark on sth
to comment/remark/observe to sb

data.text: statement ♦ comment ♦ announcement ♦ remark ♦ declaration ♦ observation

data.chText: 以上各词均指口头或书面的说明、宣布。
data.enText: These are all words for sth that you say or write, especially sth that gives information or an opinion.
statement

data.chText: 通常指正式的说明、声明、陈述、报告：
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion, often in a formal way

data.chText: 政府发言人向新闻界发表了一份声明。
data.enText: A government spokesperson made a statement to the press.
comment

data.chText: 指议论、评论、解释：
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives an opinion on sth or is a response to a question about a particular situation

data.chText: 她对我的工作提出了有益的意见。
data.enText: She made helpful comments on my work.
announcement

data.chText: 指公告、布告、通告：
data.enText: a spoken or written statement that informs people about sth

data.chText: 和平协议公告
data.enText: the announcement of a peace agreement
remark

data.chText: 指谈论、言论、评述：
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives an opinion or thought about sb/sth

data.chText: 对于这食物他作了许多无礼的评论。
data.enText: He made a number of rude remarks about the food.
declaration

data.chText: 指官方或正式的公告、宣告、宣言、声明：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) an official or formal statement, especially one that states an intention, belief or feeling, or that gives information

data.chText: 宣战
data.enText: the declaration of war
observation

data.chText: 尤指根据所见、所闻、所读而作的评论：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) a comment, especially one based on sth you have seen, heard or read

data.chText: 开头他先对这个报告作了几点概括性的评论。
data.enText: He began by making a few general observations about the report.

data.chText: 用comment、remark还是observation？
comment既可是官方的也可是个人的；remark既可是公开的也可是私下的，但总是非官方的，说话者可能未经深思熟虑；observation是非官方的，但通常较remark多几分考虑。
data.enText: A comment can be official or private. A remark can be made in public or private but is always unofficial and the speaker may not have considered it carefully. An observation is unofficial but is usually more considered than a remark.
comment, remark or observation?
to make a(n) statement/comment/announcement/remark/declaration/observation
to issue a(n) statement/comment/announcement/declaration
a(n) statement/comment/announcement/remark/declaration/observation about/on sth
an official statement/comment/announcement/declaration
a public statement/comment/announcement/remark/declaration
a private statement/comment/remark/observation

simple_means.memory_skill: com 表加强 + ment 思考，神智 → 努力把自己的思考〔表达出来〕→ 评论

ex.enText: In my opinion, he is innocent.

ex.chText: 他们征求了厂内工人的意见。
ex.enText: They have asked for the opinion of the workers in the factory.

ex.chText: 与普遍的看法相反，咖啡对人是很有好处的。
ex.enText: Contrary to popular opinion, coffee is quite good for you.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，泛指对某人或某事物的想法。

ex.chText: 谁有什么问题或意见吗？
ex.enText: Does anyone have any questions or comments?

ex.chText: 他对经济改革作出了评论。
ex.enText: He made comments on the economic reform.

synonyms.bx: 指对某人或某事物所发表的意见、见解。

ex.chText: 对于教育他有些相当与众不同的见解。
ex.enText: He had some rather unusual ideas about education.

ex.chText: 她对于抚养孩子的看法很受家长们欢迎。
ex.enText: Her ideas on raising children were popular among parents.

synonyms.bx: 指某人对某事物的看法，通常用复数，常后接介词 about/on。

ex.enText: What is your view/opinion on the school rules?

ex.chText: 他在政治上有鲜明的观点。
ex.enText: He has strong views/opinions about politics.

synonyms.bx: 指个人对某事物的观点或态度，常可与 opinion 换用。

d: 看法，意见。﹝辨析﹞指个人对某事物的观点或态度，常可与 opinion 换用

ex.zh: 对某人/某事作评论；某人/某事的写照

data.enText: no comment

data.chText: 无可奉告

before.chText: 通常用于回答记者的问题
before.enText: said in reply to a question, usually from a journalist

data.enText: I have nothing to say about that

data.chText: “先生，你会辞职吗？”“无可奉告！”
data.enText: ‘Will you resign, sir?’ ‘No comment!’

tr: a written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material
example: he wrote an extended comment on the proposal

tr: a statement that expresses a personal opinion or belief or adds information
example: from time to time she contributed a personal comment on his account

tr: a report (often malicious) about the behavior of other people
provide interlinear explanations for words or phrases
example: He annotated on what his teacher had written

tr: make or write a comment on
example: he commented the paper of his colleague

value.def: If you comment on something, you give your opinion about it or you give an explanation for it.

example.ex: So far, Mr Cook has not commented on these reports...
example.tran: 到目前为止，库克先生仍未就这些报道发表评论。

example.ex: Stratford police refuse to comment on whether anyone has been arrested...
example.tran: 斯特拉福德警方拒绝对是否已有人被捕一事发表任何评论。

example.ex: You really can't comment till you know the facts...
example.tran: 知道真相之前，不要发表任何意见。

example.ex: 'I'm always happy with new developments,' he commented...
example.tran: “我总是很高兴有新的发展。”他议论道。

example.ex: Stuart commented that this was very true.
example.tran: 斯图尔特评论说这千真万确。

value.def: A comment is something that you say which expresses your opinion of something or which gives an explanation of it.

example.ex: He made his comments at a news conference in Amsterdam...
example.tran: 他在阿姆斯特丹的记者招待会上发表了意见。

example.ex: I was wondering whether you had any comments about that?...
There's been no comment so far from police about the allegations...
example.tran: 到目前为止，警方对这些指控还没有发表任何评论。

example.ex: Lady Thatcher, who is abroad, was not available for comment.
example.tran: 撒切尔夫人现在国外，所以不能发表评论。

value.def: If an event or situation is a comment on something, it reveals something about that thing, usually something bad.

example.ex: He argues that family problems are typically a comment on some unresolved issues in the family.
example.tran: 他认为各种家庭问题通常都反映出家庭内部存在一些有待解决的矛盾。

value.tran: (通常是不好的事的)体现，写照

value.def: People say 'no comment' as a way of refusing to answer a question, usually when it is asked by a journalist.

example.ex: No comment. I don't know anything.
example.tran: 无可奉告。我什么都不知道。

value.tran: 无可奉告(通常用于回答记者的提问)

value.boxu_tran: comment 表示发表评论或意见。例如：Mr Cook has not commented on these reports (库克先生并未就这些报道发表评论)，I was wondering whether you had any comments (请问您对此有何见解)。mention 表示简要地说起某事，尤其是以前没有说过的内容。例如：He mentioned that he might go to New York (他提到过可能会去纽约)。remark 通常指随意地说出自己的想法或注意到的事情。例如，Visitors remark on how well the children look (前来探望的人说孩子们看上去很健康)，General Sutton's remarks about the conflict (萨顿将军对这场冲突的看法)。
value.boxu_usage: If you comment on a situation, or make a comment about it, you give your opinion on it. Mr Cook has not commented on these reports... I was wondering whether you had any comments. If you mention something, you say it, but only briefly, especially when you have not talked about it before. He mentioned that he might go to New York. If you remark on something, or make a remark about it, you say what you think or what you have noticed, often in a casual way. Visitors remark on how well the children look... General Sutton's remarks about the conflict.

trans: 评论；就（某人某事）发表看法
无可奉告，不加评论，拒绝置评
总体评价；一般性评论；一般意见；一般性意见；一般评论

partsOfSpeech.dec: a 无 + ment 头脑，智力 + ia 某种病 → 无心智的病 → 智力缺陷
com 共同 + ment 头脑，智力 → 共同思考，述说各自观点 → 评论
comment 评论，评注 + ate 做，造成，使… → 评述；注释
de 去掉 + ment 头脑，智力 + ed 表形容词 → 去掉心智 → 失去理智的
ment 头脑，智力 + al …的 → 智力的；精神的
ment 头脑，智力 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 心智活动
ment 头脑，智力 + ion 表动作 → 有思考 → 提到，论及
ment 头脑，智力 + or 表人 → 精神上的指导人 → 导师
com 共同 + par 平等 + ison → 平等地放在一起 → 比较
com 共同 + passion 感情 → 有共同感情 → 同情
com 共同 + patri 父亲 + ot 表人 → 同一个父亲 → 同胞
com 共同 + pon 放 + ent 人或物 → 放到一起〔组成其他事物的东西〕→ 成分
con 共同 + centric 中心的 → 同中心的
con 共同 + cord 心 → 同心协力 → 和睦
con 共同 + cur 跑，引申为发生 → 同时发生
con 共同 + flict 打 → 两边打斗 → 冲突
con 共同 + flu 流 + ence 表行为 → 流到一起 → 汇流
con 共同 + front 面 → 面对
con 共同 + nect 连接 → 连接；联合
con 共同 + sist 站 → 站在一起 → 一致
con 共同 + son 声音 + ant …的 → 共同的声音 → 一致的
con 共同 + spir 呼吸 + e → 沆瀣一气 → 同谋
con 共同 + tempor 时间 + ary …的 → 同时代的
cor 共同 + relate 联系 → 共同联系 → 相互关联
cor 共同 + respond 反应 → 相互反应 → 通信
com 表加强 + bat 打，击 → 打得非常激烈 → 格斗
com 表加强 + fort 强壮的 → 使〔精神〕强大 → 安慰
com 表加强 + memor 记忆 + ate 做，造成，使… → 纪念
com 表加强 + ment 思考，神智 → 努力把自己的思考〔表达出来〕→ 评论
com 表加强 + mot 动 + ion 表状态 → 到处都在动 → 动乱
com 表加强 + pact 合同 → 合同
com 表加强 + pel 驱动，推 → 一再推 → 强迫
com 表加强 + pet 追求 + e → 一再追求，永无止境 → 比赛
com 表加强 + plac 使满意 + ent 具有…性质的 → 对〔自己〕非常满意 → 自满的
com 表加强 + plet 满 + e → 全部满了 → 完成
com 表加强 + prehend 抓住 → 牢牢抓住 → 理解
com 表加强 + press 压 → 一再压 → 压缩
con 表加强 + cept 拿，握住 → 牢牢拿住 → 概念
con 表加强 + cis 切 + e → 切掉〔多余的〕→ 简洁的
con 表加强 + clud 关闭 + e → 关掉 → 结束
con 表加强 + dense 密集的 → 使变密集 → 凝结；浓缩
con 表加强 + duct 引导 → 管理；引导
con 表加强 + fid 相信 + ant 表人 → 让人信任的人 → 知己
con 表加强 + firm 坚定 → 非常肯定 → 证实
con 表加强 + greg 集合 + ate 做，造成，使… → 集合到一起 → 聚集
cor 表加强 + rect 正 → 一再改正 → 纠正
cor 表加强 + robor 力量 + ate 使… → 使更有力 → 使坚固
cor 表加强 + ros 咬 + ion 表动作 → 不断咬 → 腐蚀
cor 表加强 + rupt 断 →〔道德〕彻底断裂 → 腐败的
